mapper.select: SELECT main.title, main.nick_name, main.input_date, main.hits, main.rv_num, main.profile, main.profile_msg, content_review.content, main.like_total FROM ( SELECT review.title, user_table.nick_name, review.input_date, review.hits, review.rv_num, user_table.profile, user_table.profile_msg, COUNT(likes.user_id) AS like_total FROM review JOIN user_table ON review.user_id = user_table.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN likes ON review.rv_num = likes.rv_num WHERE review.rv_num = #{rv_num} GROUP BY review.title, user_table.nick_name, review.input_date, review.rv_num, user_table.profile, user_table.profile_msg, review.hits ) main LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rv_num, TO_CLOB(content) AS content FROM review WHERE rv_num = #{rv_num} ) content_review ON main.rv_num = content_review.rv_num
